mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY(diary_id, emotion_id, user_id, blind_status, delete_status, diary_title, diary_text, location, weather, like_count, delete_date, share_status, report_count, diary_date, sort_condition) VALUES(diary_seq.nextval, #{emotionNo}, #{userId}, DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{diaryTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diaryText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location}, #{weather}, DEFAULT, null, #{shareStatus}, DEFAULT, #{diaryDate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT d.DIARY_TITLE,d.DIARY_ID,d.LOCATION,d.WEATHER,d.DIARY_DATE,a.IMAGE_NAME,d.DIARY_TEXT, d.SHARE_STATUS FROM DIARY d, IMAGE a WHERE d.user_id = #{value} AND d.delete_status = 0 and d.DIARY_ID = a.DIARY_ID(+) ORDER BY d.diary_date desc

SELECT d.DIARY_TITLE,d.DIARY_ID,d.LOCATION,d.WEATHER,d.DIARY_DATE,a.IMAGE_NAME,d.DIARY_TEXT, d.SHARE_STATUS FROM DIARY d, IMAGE a WHERE d.user_id != #{userId} AND d.delete_status = 0 and d.DIARY_ID = a.DIARY_ID(+) and share_status= 1 ORDER BY d.diary_date desc
mapper.update: update DIARY set DELETE_STATUS = 1, DELETE_DATE = SYSDATE where DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AttachFile(file_id, diary_id, file_name, file_status) VALUES(attachfile_seq.nextval, diary_seq.currval, #{value}, '0')
INSERT INTO IMAGE(IMAGE_ID, DIARY_ID, IMAGE_NAME) VALUES(image_seq.nextval, diary_seq.currval, #{fileName})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.file_name AS file_name FROM DIARY d, ATTACHFILE a WHERE d.diary_id=a.diary_id AND d.user_id = #{value} and a.FILE_STATUS = '0'AND d.delete_status='0' ORDER BY file_name desc
select DISTINCT diary_id, user_id, diary_title, report_count, blind_status from diary where report_count >= 3
mapper.update: { CALL BEGIN UPDATE (SELECT d.diary_id AS diary_id, u.user_id AS user_id, u.blind_count AS blind_count, d.blind_status AS blind_status FROM diary d, users u WHERE d.user_id = u.user_id AND d.diary_id = #{value}) d SET d.blind_status = '1'; MERGE INTO users u USING (SELECT d.diary_id AS diary_id, u.user_id AS user_id, u.blind_count AS blind_count, d.blind_status AS blind_status FROM diary d, users u WHERE d.user_id = u.user_id AND d.diary_id = #{value}) d ON (u.user_id = d.user_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET u.blind_count = d.blind_count + 1, u.limit_end_date = null; END }
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(DIARY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') DIARY_DATE, DIARY_ID, WEATHER FROM DIARY WHERE USER_ID = #{username} and DIARY_DATE >= #{start} and DIARY_DATE <=#{end} and DELETE_STATUS = '0'

SELECT d.DIARY_TITLE,d.DIARY_ID,d.LOCATION,d.WEATHER,d.DIARY_DATE,a.IMAGE_NAME,d.DIARY_TEXT, d.SHARE_STATUS FROM DIARY d, IMAGE a WHERE d.user_id = #{value} and d.DIARY_ID = a.DIARY_ID(+) and d.DELETE_STATUS = '1' ORDER BY d.diary_date desc
mapper.update: update DIARY set REPORT_COUNT = REPORT_COUNT + 1 where DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.diary_id AS diary_id, d.diary_title AS diary_title, d.diary_date AS diary_date, d.weather AS weather, d.location AS location, a.file_name AS file_name, d.SHARE_STATUS AS share_status, i.image_name FROM DIARY d, ATTACHFILE a,IMAGE i WHERE d.diary_id=a.diary_id AND d.diary_id=i.diary_id AND d.user_id=#{userId} AND a.file_name=#{tag} AND d.delete_status='0'
mapper.update: update DIARY set LIKE_COUNT = LIKE_COUNT + 1 where DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
update DIARY set DELETE_STATUS = '0' where DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
